New Records: Glenn Phillips scored 104 runs, the highest score in the match, breaking a player record
Key Match Events: Glenn Phillips and Daryl Mitchell put on 84 runs in 10.5 overs, forming a game-changing partnership
Phillips contributed 40 runs through running between the wickets, a significant departure from his previous century
Post-Match Reflections: Phillips highlighted the win's significance due to the World Cup stage and team effort
Miscellaneous Highlights: Phillips' humorous comments on stump mics added a unique touch to the match
